description.value:
Frequency once per day

You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a @Template[cone|distance:30], dealing @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d8[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic|options:area-effect] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))[bleed]] damage. At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

Note The feat does not specify the type of saving throw required. A reflex saving throw has been added, in line with Barbed Quills.
